firstScreen.description: A dedicated Iron Mountain asset lifecycle team provides a single program to retrieve, redeploy, or retire every device across the healthcare enterprise.
firstScreen.title: Lifecycle logistics built for global scale

secondScreen.stepFourDescription: Sync redeployment status with ITSM tools for downstream transparency.
secondScreen.stepOneDescription: Collect devices across enterprise offices, remote teams, and global warehouses.
secondScreen.stepThreeDescription: Refurbish and redeploy hardware with updated images and documentation.
secondScreen.stepTwoDescription: Scan, sanitize, and transport each asset with full chain-of-custody visibility.
secondScreen.title: Device retrieval & redeployment services
